entry.title: Genpak - L700 - Plastic Lids for 4C Foam Soup Container - 10 x 50/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Genpak
Type: Disposables
Price: 29.99

The L700 Genpak Plastic Lids fit Genpak 500K, 700M, 3.5M, 4C Foam Soup Containers. These lids are vented to let steam escape.

entry.title: Genpak - 4C - 4 oz Foam Container - 25 / Sleeve
entry.summary:
Vendor: Genpak
Type: Disposables
Price: 3.99

If you want your soup to stay hot or your ice cream to stay cold, utilize a Genpak 4C foam soup container, foam food container. Nothing keeps foods at their optimal temperature longer than Genpak foam. When it comes to the Food service industry, nothing compares to the convenience, durability and value of foam products. 

• Genpak - 4C - 4 oz Foam Container - 25 / Sleeve

• Perfect for hot & cold items

• Designed for easy separation with contoured lip for superior lid fit

• Lids are available in flat foam, flat plastic and dome plastic.
